ModMetaData.name: Raiders Never Retreat
ModMetaData.author: NilchEi
ModMetaData.description:
Hostile humanlike raider units will never retreat from the map like Mechanoids (flee message still apeears but has no effect).
When raider decides to kidnap or steal, only units actually holding the downed colonist or item will leave while remaining units continue the assault.
For those who seek unrelenting challenge from one's adversaries.
